title: Have you ever beat an entire video game without saving once? - Quora

response.answer_text: No I haven't. I probably could if I really wanted to (I have been playing games for over 25 years now), if I have played the game a few times and know how/where to anticipate its challenges. But I am more interested in taking my time, soaking in everything the game has to offer, and save often to resume my progress. I might still try to do a 'no-saves' run some day as a challenge.

Yes, it was a long time ago back in like 1999 or something, i didn’t own a console and a friend let me borrow his play station 1 with the game resident evil 1 but he didn’t have a memory card so i t took me about 7 hours of gameplay, i didn’t speak english back then and i was young, i had to guess how to beat the game but i did it in the end and i ended up very dizzy.
